typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Category as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> srccncstatus
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
srccncstatus sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> PartitionDataSetCDM
